SUBJECT:   I run a private consultancy,
  I run a private consultancy, and currently have access to a
high-net-worth individual who, due to instability in her country, is
interested in a confidential collaboration that can facilitate
relocation of her financial resources through investments in real
estate or other lucrative areas of business. I am seeking a foreigner
with solid investment ideas who can partner with me to make this a
success. Kindly contact me for details if you are interested.
Regards.
Mr Abdel   
From: a***************0@gmail.com
To: qp11868@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-09 18:05:40
SUBJECT: INVESTMENT FUND.
Hello, how are you doing?
Do you have Financial Management abilities, shovel-ready projects in need
of funding, existing businesses requiring expansion or any lucrative
investment idea?
Some wealthy people around the globe are now realizing the need to spread
this opportunity to everyone that has the above needs, especially job
creating ones. This pandemic has really changed the mindset of many rich
people, as many of them are now willing to invest their funds to create
jobs, instead of dumping in financial institutions, enriching them more.
I represent the interest of some wealthy men and I was mandated to source
for capable and trustworthy people/corporate entities with good investment
ideas. We would be delighted to work with you. Leave me a few lines for
further details if you have such a need.
Regards,
Abdel.
From: a***************0@gmail.com
To: qp11868@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-11 11:28:38
SUBJECT: Re: INVESTMENT FUND.
Thanks for your mail, Christina, and sincere apologies for the delays in
responding to you.
This entire project consists of  investing a certain amount of money in any
lucrative business, provided it can return any profit. The owner/s of
funds are doing this to help stabilize and create opportunities for anyone
who knows what to do with funds to make any profit on Commercial and
Residential Real Estate in your country, or any country you feel is good
for such. The Real Estate investment area will be acquiring Commercial
properties and Residential Houses, or any other lucrative
business/investment you are familiar with, that is guaranteed to make some
profits. You will have to open an account in your company's name in the
same bank where the funds are lodged, for easy transfer of the funds to
your final destination where the investment will take place.
Please, be informed that before we can proceed deep into this transaction,
we will have to enter into a contract agreement which will clearly state
our interests and stakes in this transaction so that we will not have any
misunderstanding or misrepresentation whatsoever during this investment
project.
Please, provide me your details as below; so we can get the ball rolling.
Full names:
Company Name:
Contact Address:
Whatsapp/mobile number
Occupation:
Position Held:
Age:
Sex:
A copy of your international passport or any government issued ID should be
attached:
As soon as I get the above, a contract agreement (MOU) and all necessary
documents will be sent to you, and I'll provide you with proof of
funds.These documents will mandate you to receive the fund as the new
beneficiary for immediate commencement of the investments. Let me use this
opportunity to inform you that all transactions will be conducted inside
the full circles of local and international laws and nothing illegal will
be done whatsoever during the course of conducting this transaction and I
also ask for your full trust and honesty as well as undivided attention in
this relationship.
I do appeal for your understanding and I also want to assure you that we
don't wish to delay nor to waste your time. After the funds have been
transferred to you, I will be coming over to meet you in your Country to
sit down and discuss more on the investments. I'm glad you are willing to
grab and utilize this great opportunity, and I also hope I can count on you
to handle this in the most professional manner. I look forward to a
successful transaction with you.
Best regards.
